mapper.insert: INSERT INTO picker_member (m_id, m_password, m_email, m_name, m_phone, m_zipcode, m_roadaddr, m_detailaddr, m_date, m_type, m_point, m_terms, m_personal, session_key, session_limit) VALUES (#{m_id}, #{m_password}, #{m_email}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_zipcode}, #{m_roadaddr}, #{m_detailaddr}, sysdate, 1, 1000, #{m_terms}, #{m_personal}, default, '')
INSERT INTO picker_point (p_num, m_id, p_date, p_history, p_point, b_code) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(p_num)+1, 1) FROM picker_point), #{m_id}, sysdate, #{p_history}, #{p_point}, null)
